original_text:
Surely now God has worn me out;
    he has made desolate all my company.
korean_text: 이제 주께서 나를 피로하게 하시고 나의 온 집안을 패망하게 하셨나이다

sentences.original_text: Surely now God has worn me out
sentences.korean_translation: 실로 이제는 하나님께서 나를 지치게 하셨다

sentences.original_text: he has made desolate all my company
